class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        from sortedcontainers import SortedList
        res = []
        curr = SortedList(range(n))
        # print(curr)
        for u, v in queries:
            skip = False
            if u not in curr:
                skip = True
            if v not in curr:
                skip = True
            if skip:
                res.append(len(curr) - 1)
                continue
            ui = curr.index(u)
            vi = curr.index(v)
            del curr[ui: vi + 1]
            # print(curr)
            curr.add(u)
            curr.add(v)
            res.append(len(curr) - 1)
            # break
        return res
